vue-swimlane/words.description: Required: Array of tags or words to be used on display.

vue-swimlane/continous.description: [Default: false]: If true, list continues forward, repeating the list.

vue-swimlane/circular.description: [Default: false]: If true, list starts from the top after completion.

vue-swimlane/pause-on-hover.description: [Default: true]: If true, animation will pause on mouse hover.

vue-swimlane/rows.description: [Default: 1]: Number of rows always visible at a time.

vue-swimlane/transition-delay.description: [Default: 250]: Delays between each animation duration in ms.
